text: Have you ever tried to make something with lumber that wasnt perfectly flat and square? Thats why you need this! A pivitol tool to any woodworkers shop, this allows us to dimenson the lumber perfectly square.
name: JET 8in Jointer

text: Have you heard of this thing? If your hand goes into the blade the blade will get sucked down into a break leaving your figers intact. I want it.
name: SawStop 3hp Professional Cabinet Saw

text: There are so many things you can do with a bandsaw. They are the tool of choice for cutting curves & resawing lumber.
name: Grizzly 17in Bandsaw

text: This thing is $1200? What a joke right? It cuts holes in wood to make quick and perfect mortise and tennon jointery every time. This tool is one of the ultimate time savers. Worth it.
name: Festool Domino

text: A good workbench is the heart of any woodshop. This would be my Dream Workbench, multiple vices for all types of work. Dogholes to hold anything, with a completly flat surfice. Perfect.
name: THE DREAM
